topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54f54d6d63687208a8d40200#post_54f54d6d63687208a8d40200
Pigeons aren't afraid of humans. I can like walk up to them and they won't fly away until I just almost touch them. Whereas crows, chickadees, robins, Steller's jays, and sparrows would freakout from the slightest flinch from me. I like crows though...

"I loled!":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ykvy9Da0KTQ

Seagulls are assholes. They bully the crows.

topics.body:
This bird talk reminds me of a story someone told me from his time in the army
They were marching in the forest when they were attacked by a pissed off wood grouse whose territory they were trespassing in. A dozen guys with assault rifles against one angry bird, and the bird won.
